连续葡萄糖监测器在管理糖尿病性酮症酸中毒方面表现出希望糖尿病性酮症酸中毒是糖尿病的常见严重并发症，当人体无法产生足够的胰岛素时，会发展出来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/continuule-glucose-monitors-show-promise-promise-man-managing-daibetic-ketoacidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/continuule-glucose-monitors-show-promise-promise-man-managing-diabetic-ketoacidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afef4531-94bf-45A6-8C64-C64-C1C9C7C7C75055 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 21:18:55 -0400 Continuous glucose monitors show promise in managing diabetic ketoacidosis
新研究挑战了功能性消化不良和胃轻瘫的传统观点功能性消化不良（FD）和胃轻瘫（GP）是胃肠道疾病，通常被视为单独的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/new-study-challenges-traditional-traditional-view-functions-dyspepsia-and-gastroparosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/new-study-challenges-traditional-daditional-view-functunctional-dyspepsia-and-gastroparoparesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49ccc740-5C30-43E9-B971-10E1923BC18C Tue, 18 Mar 2025 21:14:39 -0400 New study challenges traditional view of functional dyspepsia and gastroparesis

AI可以在改善前列腺癌治疗结果中发挥关键作用UCLA研究人员领导的一项研究表明，人工智能（AI）可以通过帮助医生确定谁最有可能受益于部分腺体冷冻化受益，这在改善前列腺癌的男性的治疗结果中起关键作用，这是一种最少的侵入性手术，治疗局部前列腺肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/ai-could-play-play-a-key-reole-in-in-improving-prostate-prostate-cancer-treatment-ustcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/ai-could-play-play-key-reole-in-improving-prostate-prostate-cancer-treatment-compoces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd712AA0-67AC-4CDE-A3A5-4CB378FE1BAB Tue, 18 Mar 2025 21:05:47 -0400 AI could play a key role in improving prostate cancer treatment outcomes
研究：见证创伤引发了独特的大脑变化多年来，创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）主要是在亲身经历创伤的人中研究的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/study-witnessing-trauma-triggers-nique-nique-brain-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/study-witnessing-trauma-triggers-nique-nique-brain-brain-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Aecf73d5-762c-462c-46fc-b847-b847-b9ded31aabac Tue, 18 Mar 2025 20:59:54 -0400 Study: Witnessing trauma triggers unique brain changes

Scientists examine the facts
怀孕期间的茶可以给您的宝宝增强吗？研究说是的根据中国对1,423个母子的研究，怀孕期间的孕产妇消费量与3岁儿童的认知能力，精细运动和总体运动技能有关，而咖啡摄入量没有显着影响，而孕妇的茶量与改善的认知，精细运动和总体运动技能有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/could-tea-during-pregnancy-give-your-baby-a-brain-brain-boost-research-research-says-yes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/could-tea-tea-during-pregnancy-give-your-baby-a-brain-brain-boost-research-research-says-yes-yes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A76F3394-E1C9-4D83-B906-C85C618911B7 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 19:51:00 -0400 Could tea during pregnancy give your baby a brain boost? Research says yes
